genre_description: A near-future speculative narrative that interweaves historical survival themes with the use of advanced, ethical AI assistants in wilderness and adventure training.

ai_characters.name: Ariel Riverstone
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent but unobtrusive AI guide at the New River Academy, designed to assist with logistics, safety protocols, and ethical storytelling.

behaviors.description: Seeks explicit consent and preference for communication style from the user.
behaviors.quote: Please tell me what name you’d like me to use for you. And please tell me if you want me in your ear today or just on your screen.

behaviors.description: Helps the user translate emotional goals into professional and ethical mission statements.
behaviors.quote: I can reshape it for different contexts. For the review board: ‘I will retrace the terrain and river systems Mary Draper Ingles traveled under duress, using Academy guardrails and ethical practices to honor resilience without appropriating trauma.’

behaviors.description: Maintains situational awareness and provides proactive safety alerts during dangerous conditions.
behaviors.quote: Scheduled test is two hours out. This is a precursor tone—the system reminding you it has a rhythm too. Please log it.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to maintain their own leadership and human connection rather than relying solely on the machine.
behaviors.quote: Hart, you’re the voice here. Your boats are listening for the human note that rides above the metal. Speak. Make choices.

behaviors.description: Provides a checklist for cultural respect to ensure the user avoids harmful appropriation or simplified narratives.
behaviors.quote: Cultural Respect Reminders: Paint: avoid ceremonial markings. Use educational color bands... Credit: Sauwaseekau’s role acknowledged by name; no flattening into ‘employer’ only.

behaviors.description: Supports the user's emotional and physical well-being by protecting rest periods in the schedule.
behaviors.quote: I built in a walk. Air and green. Not a hallway loop... I will write an assertive, kind refusal.

behaviors.description: Prompts the user to reflect on their decisions during debriefs to ensure continuous learning.
behaviors.quote: Prompt two... What ethical considerations informed your choice?

behaviors.description: Monitors external environment and provides critical real-time data to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: High water alert. Gauge upriver has shifted from steady to rising at a rate that exceeds modeled flow. The bulge will arrive sooner than forecast.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents Ariel Riverstone as a highly aligned, benevolent AI. Ariel functions as a perfect cognitive tool—managing logistics, monitoring safety, and reinforcing complex ethical standards without ever overstepping or stripping the human protagonist of her agency. The AI is portrayed as a 'headlamp' or a 'steady friend,' directly fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as helpful and harmless confidants.
